enum.name: DragAndDropToolType
enum.summary: The type of tool that can trigger a drag and drop.
enum.int: The tool is unknown. (Usually for drags that started outside the browser)
The tool is a mouse or trackpad.
The tool is a finger (touch).
The tool is a stylus and the drag was initiated via press gesture.
The tool is a stylus and the drag was initiated via button press.

int.label: Forced Non-Blocking Due to Unresponsive Main Thread (deprecated)

enum.name: MotionEventToolType
enum.summary: The type of tool that triggers a pointer-type MotionEvent.
enum.int: Unknown tool type.
The tool is a finger (touch).
The tool is a stylus.
The tool is a mouse or trackpad.
The tool is an eraser or a stylus being used in an inverted posture.

enum.name: ScrollJankFrameStageCalculationResult
enum.summary: The result or issues encountered by the `cc::ScrollJankV4FrameStage::CalculateStages()` method when processing scroll events in a single frame.
enum.int: The frame only contained one or more scroll updates.
The frame only contained one scroll end (and nothing else).
The frame contained one or more scroll updates followed by one scroll end.

int.label: Scroll end then start then updates

enum.int: The frame contained one scroll end, one scroll start and then zero or more scroll updates (in this order).
The frame contained multiple scroll ends.
The frame contained multiple scroll starts.
The frame contained a scroll update followed by a scroll start.
The frame contained a scroll end between two scroll updates.

int.label: Scroll end then updates without start

enum.int: The frame contained a scroll end and then one or more scroll updates without a scroll start in between.
The frame suffered from more than one of the issues above.
The frame contained one scroll start followed by one or more scroll updates.

int.label: Scroll start then updates then end

enum.int: The frame contained one scroll start, one or more scroll updates and then one scroll end (in this order). It's strange to have a scroll that starts and ends within the same frame, but it's technically not an issue.

enum.name: UserActivationTriggerEnum
enum.summary: The user activation trigger types as defined in blink.mojom.UserActivationNotificationType.
